{{Description|[[Azhdaha]] was unable to unseal itself in the end, and the quaking earth was at last put to rest.<br>Yet the memories of facing the sealed dragon in the heart of the earth itself remain ever so vivid.<br>Challenge it in your memories once more, and you may gain something new from that encounter...|Memories: Earthshaking Dragon}}
'''Beneath the Dragon-Queller''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing {{Quest|No Mere Stone}}. Players can relive the fight they had with Lord of Vishaps [[Azhdaha (Weekly Boss)|Azhdaha]] and receive bountiful rewards.

It is located under the [[Dragon-Queller]] in [[Nantianmen]], [[Liyue]].

The domain entrance is marked with the elements that Azhdaha will absorb inside the domain, which change every week based on [[Azhdaha (Weekly Boss)#Elements|a fixed rotation]].

==Enemies==
{{Card|Azhdaha (Weekly Boss)|type=Enemy|show_caption=1|caption=Azhdaha}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
When Azhdaha's Cryo, Pyro, Electro, and Hydro attacks hit characters who are not under the protection of a shield, that character will be marked. Marked characters will continuously take {{Color|Black|Elemental DMG}}.

==Rewards==
{{Weekly Boss Rewards
|exclusive=Dragon Lord's Crown,Bloodjade Branch,Gilded Scale
|gem=Prithiva Topaz,Varunada Lazurite,Vajrada Amethyst,Agnidus Agate,Shivada Jade
}}
Other than [[Prithiva Topaz]] {{Icon/Element|Geo|24}}, the possible Ascension Gems obtained depend on the [[#Elements|Elements]] Azhdaha infuses.
